author: FourFourTwo
description: Watford will again be looking for a new boss after this season, with Walter Mazzarri leaving the club.
title: BREAKING NEWS: Walter Mazzarri leaving Watford job

author: BBC Sport
description: Walter Mazzarri is to leave Watford after Sunday's final game of the season at home to Manchester City.
title: Watford manager Walter Mazzarri to leave after final match of season

author: talkSPORT
description: Watford will begin their search for a ninth manager in just five years after announcing they will part company with Walter Mazzarri. Mazzarri's fate was sealed in a meeting with the club's board on Wednesday afternoon. His final game in charge will be at home to Manchester City on Sunday. The 55-year-old Italian, who has also managed at Inter Milan and Napoli, signed a three-year contract at Watford last summer, but will leave after just one term in charge.
title: CONFIRMED: Walter Mazzarri to leave Watford at the end of the Premier League season

description: Fiorentina and Walter Mazzarri’s Watford are reportedly in a transfer tug-of-war for Torino midfielder Mirko Valdifiori.
title: Watford & Fiorentina eye Valdifiori?

title: Ranieri in for Mazzarri at Watford?

author: FourFourTwo
description: Departing Watford boss Walter Mazzarri has enjoyed his spell in England, but found Watford's level of ambition problematic.
title: Mazzarri takes parting shot at Watford before exit
